title: Introduction to Python
description: Welcome to Python programming! Learn what Python is and why it's popular.

steps.title: What is Python?
steps.content: Python is a high-level, interpreted programming language created by Guido van Rossum in 1991. It's designed with readability in mind, using English keywords and simple syntax. Python is used in web development, data science, artificial intelligence, automation, and scientific computing.

steps.title: Why Choose Python?
steps.content:
• Easy to learn and read - Python's syntax is clean and intuitive
• Versatile - Used in many fields from web apps to AI
• Large community - Millions of developers worldwide
• Rich libraries - Thousands of pre-built packages available
• Cross-platform - Runs on Windows, Mac, Linux

steps.title: Your First Python Program
steps.content: The traditional first program in any language prints 'Hello, World!' to the screen:
steps.code:
print('Hello, World!')
print('Welcome to Python programming!')
print('Python is', 2024 - 1991, 'years old')

practiceProblems.title: Dynamic Information
practiceProblems.description: Create a program that displays the current year and calculates Python's age dynamically.
practiceProblems.starterCode:
# Calculate and display Python's age
# Python was created in 1991
practiceProblems.solution:
import datetime
current_year = datetime.datetime.now().year
python_birth_year = 1991
age = current_year - python_birth_year
print(f'Current year: {current_year}')
print(f'Python\'s age: {age} years')
